reviewText:
While I realize that this video is supposed to be instructional, there's really no reason why it can't be EROTIC at the same time.  I mean, here you've got these two pretty young women taking turns massaging one another, starting with breast-massaging, then butt-massaging, and ending up with vagina massaging.  No, it's not a sex-video, but did it really have to be this perfunctory and clinical?

There are precious few moments where either of the women involved shows any particular physical attraction for the other, as they seem mostly aware that they're on camera supposedly illustrating for us the proper methods for massaging another woman's breasts, butt, and vagina.

This isn't rocket science.  The least they can do is to show a beautiful woman who seemingly truly-enjoys touching, caressing, & fondling another woman's beautiful body!
